problem_text_cn: 如图,圆锥底面半径为rcm,母线长为10cm,其侧面展开图是圆心角为216°的扇形,则r的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the bottom surface of the cone is r, the length of the generatrix is N_0, and the expanded figure of the lateral surface is a sector with a central angle of N_1, then the value of r is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵圆锥底面半径为rcm,母线长为10cm,其侧面展开图是圆心角为216°的扇形,∴2πr=\frac{216}{360}×2π×10,解得r=6．故选:B．
